name: .RYK
summary: Learn about .RYK files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: Because RYK files are encrypted and cannot be decrypted, you cannot open them. Typically, your best option for restoring ransomware-encrypted files to their previous state is to perform a System Restore. However, Ryuk typically disables this option. At this time, there is no solution for restoring RYK files to their previous state.
